title: 55. Money Saving Tips from a "Naturally Frugal" girl
description:
I got this message from a listener "I had an idea for your podcast, mainly cause it will help me. So it‚Äôs a selfish idea I guess üòÇ you‚Äôve mentioned before that you are naturally frugal, and the thing is I‚Äôm not. At all. But I need to learn to be and I‚Äôve been working on it. But I could use advice from someone who‚Äôs naturally good at it. So maybe at some point you could do a podcast on the things you and your husband do, and did early in your marriage, to avoid spending unnecessary." This episode is my attempt at answering this question!
